    • About Me

    My name is Justin Goats and I am a web developer. All my life I have been a builder. I love to take components apart, learn how they work and then put everything back together. first with legos when I was a child, then with lawn movers when I was a teenager, and now with code. What I enjoy most about coding is the ability to have an idea in my head for a cool project and make it a reality.
